text:
I'm from São Paulo - Brazil, I am 25 years old and at the beginning of my career as a developer. Soon, I will graduate in Systems Analysis and Development from Anhembi Morumbi University. I am passionate about technology and games, but especially about web development. For two years, I worked on a volunteer project for a senior care center, where I worked as a Front-End Developer, being primarily responsible for creating responsive and functional screens.
Currently, I am studying the React library and the Next.js Framework, and soon I will begin studying the main Back-End programming languages and technologies, aiming to become a Full-Stack developer.
name: Almeida Daniel
overview: and I'm a Front-end Web Developer
